abstract: Could the former top cat at the Mouse House become the big cheese at Tribune Co.? The Los Angeles Times reported that former Walt Disney chief executive Michael Eisner is in talks that could make him chairman of the now-bankrupt media company.
snippet: Could the former top cat at the Mouse House become the big cheese at Tribune Co.? The Los Angeles Times reported that former Walt Disney chief executive Michael Eisner is in talks that could make him chairman of the now-bankrupt media company.
lead_paragraph: Could the former top cat at the Mouse House become the big cheese at Tribune Company? The Los Angeles Times reported that the former Walt Disney C.E.O. Michael Eisner is in the midst of talks that could place him as chairman of the now-bankrupt media company.
